text:
Hey everyone - :mega: Quick announcement regarding an update to the template marketplace theme requirements...

The following form fields are removed from the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/cms/marketplace/theme-requirements#theme-limits:~:text=including%20hover%20styling-,Form%20fields,-%3A|form fields section> and are no longer required:
• Form title background
• Form title text, including at least font color styles
